posts.title: Mac Homebrew 切换源
posts.text: Homebrew默认源为Github，国内访问很慢，故切换到国内源。 切换到中科大源1cd "$(brew --repo)"2git remote set-url origin https://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/brew.git34cd "$(brew --repo)/Library/Taps/homebrew/homebrew-core"5git remote set-url origin https://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/homebrew-core.git67cd "$(brew --repo)/Library/Taps/homebrew/homebrew-cask"8git remote set-url origin https://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/homebrew-cask.git910brew update11brew --version 切换回默认源1cd "$(brew --repo)"2git remote set-url origin https://github.com/Homebrew/brew.git34cd "$(brew --repo)/Library/Taps/homebrew/homebrew-core"5git remote set-url origin https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-core.git67cd "$(brew --repo)/Library/Taps/homebrew/homebrew-cask"8git remote set-url origin https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-cask.git910brew update11brew --version

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick Start Create a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post"More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo serverMore info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generateMore info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deployMore info: Deployment
